About

I'm Gustavo Costa. Before I wrote code, I worked as a clinical psychologist and psychoanalyst in Brasília, Brazil. That work taught me how to navigate complexity and ask better questions, rather than rushing to immediate solutions.

Now I build AI systems and conduct research at the intersection of technology and the humanities. This interdisciplinary experience showed me how optimization, when applied thoughtfully in humanistic contexts, can help systems better achieve their purpose.

Simulacro Tech is where I bring this together through a diverse range of technical solutions, including RAG systems, mixed-methods research, and data strategy -- all built with the same care I brought to clinical practice.

Education

Master of Arts and Sciences
London Interdisciplinary School

Specialist in Lacanian Psychoanalysis

Universidade de Brasília

Experience

Psychotherapy
Partner at Espaço Psique Psychology Clinic (2020-2024)

Writing & Research
Essays on data science and AI at simulacro.co.uk; essays on philosophy of psychoanalysis at gustavocosta.psc.br; dissertation on AI slop using mixed-methods

RAG systems, NLP applications, and data analysis tools. See simulacro.cv for details.
